ARABIC: ثُمَّ لَنَحْنُ أَعْلَمُ بِٱلَّذِينَ هُمْ أَوْلَىٰ بِهَا صِلِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Then it is We who will know best those most deserving to roast in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We know best who deserve to be burnt in (the Fire).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and then We shall know well all those most worthy to be cast in Hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We know best who deserves greater suffering in hell fire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Moreover, We well know those who most deserve to be burned in hell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then, verily, We know best those who are most worthy of being burnt therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Again We do certainly know best those who deserve most to be burned therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then We shall know very well those most deserving to burn there.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And surely We are Best Aware of those most worthy to be burned therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We surely know best those most deserving of the fires of hell,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then surely it is We who are the Best Knower of these worthiest of being therein roasted. *Chapter: 19
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then surely We will know best those who deserve most to enter it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And certainly We know best those who are most worthy of being burned therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then, verily, We know best those who are most worthy of being burnt therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We alone know who deserves most to be burned therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We are fully aware of those most deserving to scorch in it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then, surely it is We who are most knowing of those most worthy of burning therein.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:70] Then indeed We shall know best those most deserving of it, most worthy of [being in] Hell, the most hardened of them and others [like them], for the burning, for the admission [into it] and the scorching [therein], and We shall start with them ([siliyyan is] originally [formed as] salawiyyun, from [the verb] saliya or salaya).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And surely We are best aware of those most worthy) of those most deserving (to be burned therein) to enter hell.
